question: The 23rd National Conference on e-Governance 2020 was organized in which of the following places of India?
explanation: The 23rd National Conference on e-Governance 2020 was organized in Mumbai, Maharashtra (7th and 8th February 2020). 10-fold Mumbai Declaration on e-governance was adopted during the event. The policy of Blockchain Sandbox and Draft Sandbox was launched for the state of Maharashtra.
